attributes.action: Stop The Sun & Daily Mail for fear-mongering and spreading hate
attributes.additional_details:
We, the undersigned, petition the UK government to stop  The Sun & Daily Mail from fear-mongering and spreading hate.
Not one day goes by that we don't see another opinionated, sensationalized headline intended to scare the public or spread hate hit the newsstands or news feeds.
If this goes far enough, it should apply to all of the tabloids.

This has gone on long enough, and we are sick of it.

It is time for unbiased news.

It is time for change.

rejection.details: The Government does not regulate what is written in the media providing that it does not break the law.
